executable.description: Command the scheduled task should execute

user.description: User to run scheduled task as

days_of_week.description: Days of the week to run a weekly task, not idempotent

state.description: State that the task should become

frequency.description: The frequency of the command, not idempotent

arguments.description: Arguments to provide scheduled task action

time.description: Time to execute scheduled task, not idempotent

path.description: Task folder in which this task will be stored - creates a non-existent path when C(state) is C(present), and removes an empty path when C(state) is C(absent)

description.description: The description for the scheduled task
